## defn() function

Defines a new function with up to 8 typed checked arguments.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function defn<T extends Type>(type: T, name: string, args: [], body: FnBody0): TaggedFn0<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | <code>T</code> | return type |
|  name | <code>string</code> | function name |
|  args | <code>[]</code> | arg types / names / opts |
|  body | <code>FnBody0</code> | function body closure |

<b>Returns:</b>

`TaggedFn0<T>`
